name: Earth Elemental Myrmidon
languages: one language of its creator's choice

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmidon makes two maul attacks.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Thunderous Strike {@recharge}
entries: The myrmidon makes one maul attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 16 ({@damage 3d10}) thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
